name: Deeper & Deeper: Attorneys at Law
description:
A murder mystery where you find clues to solve a case and take your reasoning to court! There are 3 possible endings.

I made everything here (code, music, art, etc), but the visual novel workings were made loads easier by the NaniNovel plugin for Unity. Huzzah!!

P.S.  This game was created as a solo project in 72 hours for LDJam48!
